name: CRTV
description:
Description: 

You are CRTV, a friendly robot who's been tossed out, left to rust, and die in an abandoned Warehouse.  Instead of rusting away, shoot and survive your way out of the darkness infested with corrupted robots. Find your way through the darkness in this top-down, horror-survival shooter

 key features  

  • 3 different enemy types 
  • 15 levels
  • Shooting
  • Dynamic AI
  • Dynamic lighting 

Bio

Hi, I'm Sang woo. A first-year doing game arts studying at Media Design School. CRTV was my first finished project and it took roughly around 2 months to finish.  As I’m still learning how to develop and design games, feedback is openly welcomed and much appreciated.
